item.title: 象牙海岸为遏制可可走私解雇安全主管
item.description: 世界上最大的可可种植国象牙海岸在继续努力遏制可可走私的同时，解雇了两名军官和其他地方政府人员。【原文：Ivory Coast, the world’s biggest cocoa grower, dismissed two military officials and other local government personnel amid continuing efforts to curb smuggling of the crop.】

item.title: 法国预算部长表示政府的目标是节约 530 亿欧元
item.description: 法国预算部长阿梅利-德蒙沙林（Amelie de Montchalin）表示，作为缩小国家赤字计划的一部分，法国政府的目标是实现 530 亿欧元（546 亿美元）的节余。【原文：France’s government aims to achieve €53 billion ($54.6 billion) of savings as part of its plans to narrow the country’s deficit, according to Budget Minister Amelie de Montchalin.】

item.title: 美国制裁后俄罗斯原油堆积在中国海岸附近
item.description: 随着贸易商、炼油商和船运公司试图避免陷入美国对俄罗斯能源流动实施的史上最严厉制裁，中国沿海滞留的石油数量不断增加。【原文：The amount of oil stranded off the Chinese coast is growing as traders, refiners and shipping companies try to avoid being caught up in the US’s strictest-ever sanctions on Russian energy flows.】

item.title: 工艺品零售商 Joann 一年内第二次申请破产
item.description: 由于销售额持续下滑，工艺品和织物零售商 Joann Inc.【原文：Crafts and fabric retailer Joann Inc. has filed bankruptcy for the second time in less than a year, as its sales continue to decline.】

item.title: Currys 恢复股息，成本控制改善前景
item.description: Currys Plc 预计今年将实现更高的利润，并恢复分红，因为它严格控制了成本。【原文：Currys Plc expects a higher profit this year and reinstated a dividend, as it kept a tight lid on costs.】

item.title: 印尼降息出乎市场意料；印尼盾下滑
item.description: 印尼一反市场预期，下调了关键利率，即使在本币近期跌破1美元兑换16,000印尼盾的关键水平后，仍采取了促进经济增长的举措。【原文：Indonesia defied market expectations by cutting its key interest rate, moving to bolster economic growth even after the local currency’s recent slide beyond the key level of 16,000 to the dollar.】

item.title: 活动人士敦促日本富士媒体调查歌星丑闻
item.description: 一位激进投资者要求日本富士媒体控股公司（Fuji Media Holdings Inc.【原文：An activist investor is demanding that Japan’s Fuji Media Holdings Inc. investigate a scandal embroiling one of the country’s most prominent celebrities, saying lack of transparency over the issue could erode shareholder value.】

item.title: 英国通胀放缓为降息敞开大门，英镑下跌
item.description: 数据显示英国 12 月通胀率意外下降，缓解了人们对持续物价压力的担忧，并可能为英国央行进一步降息打开大门，英镑随之下跌。【原文：The pound fell after data showed UK inflation fell unexpectedly in December, easing fears over persistent price pressures and potentially opening the door to further Bank of England interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 英国通胀意外放缓提振降息希望
item.description: 英国 12 月份的通胀率出人意料地出现了三个月来的首次回落，使英国央行下月降息的希望得以延续。【原文：UK inflation unexpectedly slipped back for the first time in three months in December, keeping alive hopes of a Bank of England interest-rate cut next month.】

item.title: 拜耳因半个世纪前的毒害事件面临数十亿美元赔偿
item.description: 拜耳公司（Bayer AG）旗下的孟山都公司（Monsanto）早在半个世纪前就停止生产有毒的多氯联苯，但即使美国的家庭、学校和工厂不再使用许多使用这种化学品制造的建筑材料，其法律后果仍然挥之不去。【原文：Bayer AG’s Monsanto unit stopped making toxic PCBs a half century ago, but the legal fallout lingers even as many of the building materials made with the chemicals are no longer used in US homes, schools and factories.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国 12 月通胀增速低于预期
腾讯与吉列莫特家族被指酝酿育碧资产合资事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd.）和育碧娱乐公司（Ubisoft Entertainment SA）的创始人吉列莫特（Guillemot）家族正在考虑成立一家新的合资企业，其中将包括育碧的某些资产，以提升这家法国视频游戏公司的价值。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. and Ubisoft Entertainment SA’s founding Guillemot family are considering creating a new venture that would include certain Ubisoft assets as they seek to boost the French video-game company’s value, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 中国各地区在 "国家指南 "中设定 2025 年增长目标
item.description: 中国五个最重要的省份表示，它们计划今年的经济增长率达到或超过 5%，这表明，尽管贸易逆风日益加剧，中国仍将制定雄心勃勃的国家目标。【原文：Five of China’s most important provinces said they plan to grow at or above 5% this year, signs that the country will set an ambitious national target despite growing trade headwinds.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司 "猎鹰9号 "发射两个探测器，登月竞赛白热化
item.description: 太空探索公司（SpaceX）发射了两颗携带月球车的商业卫星，私营部门在月球竞赛中的竞争愈演愈烈。【原文：SpaceX launched a pair of commercial satellites carrying lunar rovers as competition intensifies in the private sector’s race to the moon.】

item.title: SGS 与必维就 330 亿美元的合并进行谈判
item.description: SGS SA 正在与必维国际检验集团（Bureau Veritas SA）商谈合并事宜，合并后的欧洲测试和认证公司市值将超过 330 亿美元。【原文：SGS SA is in talks to combine with Bureau Veritas SA in a deal that would create a European testing and certification company with a combined market value of more than $33 billion.】

item.title: 制作超凡人工智能头像的初创公司 Synthesia 以 21 亿美元估值融资
item.description: Synthesia 是一家人工智能初创公司，可帮助企业制作栩栩如生的视频头像，该公司在一轮融资中筹集了 1.8 亿美元，成为英国最大的人工智能公司之一。【原文：Synthesia, an artificial intelligence startup that lets businesses produce lifelike video avatars, has raised $180 million in a funding round making it one of Britain’s largest AI companies.】

item.title: 价值 480 亿美元的债券投资者认为东欧风险太大，不敢涉足
item.description: Brandywine Global Investment Management 认为，东欧的政治和经济风险太高，以目前的收益率购买其债券是不合理的。【原文：Eastern Europe’s political and economic risks are too high to justify buying its bonds at current yields, according to Brandywine Global Investment Management.】

item.title: Mozilla 就拒绝聘用苹果激进分子一事达成和解
item.description: Mozilla 公司已同意就因苹果公司前软件工程师曾参与劳工活动而拒绝聘用她的指控达成和解。【原文：Mozilla Corp. has agreed to settle allegations it refused to hire a former Apple Inc. software engineer because of her prior labor activism.】

item.title: 富裕世界为何需要人工智能和非洲
item.description:
越来越少的新生儿正在改变我们生活的世界，而西方国家却没有心情研究替代方案。【原文：

Fewer births are remaking the world we live in, and the west isn’t in the mood to examine the alternatives. 

】

item.title: 新西兰债券在 2024 年创下世界纪录的反弹后延续跌势
item.description: 新西兰短期主权债券创下了一个月来最严重的连跌纪录，原因是交易商锁定了全球大涨带来的利润，并调整了对央行宽松政策的预期。【原文：Short-term New Zealand sovereign bonds notched their worst losing streak in a month as traders locked in profits from a world-beating rally and adjusted expectations of central bank easing.】

item.title: 美国将推动台积电和三星收紧对华芯片供应
item.description: 美国计划出台更多法规，以阻止台湾半导体制造股份有限公司和其他生产商生产的先进芯片流向中国，这是拜登政府在任期最后几天推出的一系列措施的一部分。【原文：The US plans to unveil more regulations aimed at keeping advanced chips made by Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. and other producers from flowing to China, part of a flurry of measures introduced by the Biden administration during its final days in office.】

item.title: 医疗旅游热潮吸引韩国过度劳累的医生
item.description:
即使医院将当地人拒之门外，外国人仍蜂拥到首尔进行整容手术。【原文：

Foreigners are flocking to Seoul for cosmetic surgery even as hospitals turn away locals.

】

item.title: 世界银行称女性参与经济增长可达 20
item.description: 英国前首相托尼-布莱尔（Tony Blair）的妻子、人权律师切丽-布莱尔（Cherie Blair）将发出号召，要求女性在去年的国际选举中勉强晋级，而全球女性公众人物面临的暴力威胁也在增加，因此女性在政治领域应发出更响亮的声音。【原文：Cherie Blair, the human rights lawyer and wife of former UK Prime Minister Tony Blair, will issue a rallying cry for women to have a louder voice in politics after female representation barely advanced in last year’s international elections and as female public figures globally faced increased threats of violence.】

item.title: 震撼英国的美国活动家
item.description:
在本期Merryn Talks Money节目中，Saba Capital 的 Boaz Weinstein 讨论了他的对冲基金对英国投资信托基金的计划。【原文：

On this episode of Merryn Talks Money, Saba Capital’s Boaz Weinstein discusses his hedge fund’s plan for British investment trusts.

】

item.title: 英国基尔-斯塔默需要抑制对人工智能的热情
item.description:
比起追逐模糊而不确定的产业政策，加倍加强国家在人工智能方面的强大监管领导力将是更明智的选择。【原文：

Doubling down on the country’s strong regulatory leadership on AI would be smarter than chasing a vague and uncertain industrial policy.

】

item.title: 伦敦不是股票低价猎手的天堂
item.description:
英国股市伤亡惨重，看起来可能很便宜，但它们面临着潜在的缓慢复苏。【原文：

UK stock market casualties may look cheap, but they face a potentially slow recovery.

】

item.title: 加密货币对冲基金在 2024 年表现出色，但未能击败比特币
item.description: 在加密货币大放异彩的一年里，专注于数字资产的对冲基金也不出意外地表现出色。只是很多基金的表现都不如这个行业最著名的代币：比特币。【原文：During a great year for cryptocurrencies, hedge funds focused on digital assets unsurprisingly did very well, too. It’s just that many didn’t do as well as the industry’s most famous token: Bitcoin.】

item.title: 欧洲央行在交易员减少押注的情况下为降息路径辩护
item.description: 投资者认为，通胀走强、美国就业市场出人意料地强劲以及唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对经济的破坏将缩小降息的空间，欧洲央行正在回击投资者的质疑。【原文：The European Central Bank is pushing back against investors who reckon firmer inflation, a surprisingly sturdy US jobs market and Donald Trump’s economic disruption will narrow the scope to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 政治风险加剧，罗马尼亚将维持利率不变：决策指南
item.description: 罗马尼亚总统选举于上月被宣布无效，政治局势的不确定性给经济增长和通货膨胀的前景蒙上了阴影，因此罗马尼亚央行可能会维持借贷成本不变。【原文：Romania’s central bank will likely keep borrowing costs unchanged as political uncertainty after last month’s annulment of the country’s presidential election clouds the outlook for economic growth and inflation.】

item.title: 奢侈品股近期复苏面临高风险盈利考验
item.description: 在过去的两个月里，欧洲那些被打压的奢侈品股票出现了转机，使这些公司即将公布的收益变得更加引人关注。【原文：Europe’s beaten-down luxury stocks have turned a corner the past two months, increasing the stakes for the earnings the companies are about to announce.】
